contentrichtext.text: '''Harri Porten''' (born 1972) is a [[software|software engineer]]. Porten, a [[KDE]] developer and former [[Trolltech]] employee, is the CEO of '''Froglogic''', a consultancy company related to [[Qt (framework)|Qt]] development. He currently lives in [[Hamburg]], [[Germany]]. Porten originally wrote the [[KDE's JavaScript engine|KJS]] [[JavaScript]] engine for [[Konqueror]], the [[KDE]] project's [[file manager]] and [[web browser]].{{fact|date=September 2012}} He also contributed to the development of [[KPPP]], the KDE project's Internet dialer.{{fact|date=September 2012}} Porten took part in the development of [[Qt (framework)|Qt]] a [[Graphical user interface|GUI]] [[toolkit]] used by [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]], [[Mac OS X]], and [[X11]] developers. <ref>[http://www.osnews.com/story.php?news_id=259 Interview with TrollTech's Harri Porten<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> His company Froglogic is known for [[Squish (Froglogic)|Squish]], a professional [[cross-platform]] automated GUI testing framework for applications written using Qt. <ref>[http://www.qanews.com/article.php?sid=125 QANews.com<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> == References == {{reflist}} == External links == *[http://www.behindkde.org/node/205 "People behind KDE" Interview from February 26th 2001] *[http://www.behindkde.org/people/harri/images/harri.png photo of Harri, from same interview] {{KDE}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Porten, Harri | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1972 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Porten, Harri}} [[Category:1972 births|Porten, Harri]] [[Category:Living people|Porten, Harri]] [[Category:KDE]] [[Category:Software engineers]] [[Category:Free software programmers]] {{Compu-scientist-stub}}
